name: RUNNERWAY
description:
Let the cute animals get away from a chasing huge pig!

This is "Run & Jump game" to get the cute amimals run away, and avoid them from being knocked down by a scary pig.
The rule is simple! Watch out for traps, jump, slide, and just run away!

The little animals roll away gracefully, and they are very cute!
Using items, the animals can become huge, and blow up obstacles!
The longer you get the aminals run away, the more you can unlock new animals!

Reach to the maximum distance, and see the figure of "Buta bird"!
